name: Frantic Farming (Hattie)
description:
This first person shooter crossed with a farming simulator is great for the casual gamers who want to have some fun . Frantic Farming involves the player feeding farm animals to keep them happy, whilst avoiding animals getting “hangry” and breaking out of their pens to attack the player. To feed animals, players must harvest food resources to feed the animals whilst avoiding the frantic animals. To win, players must harvest produce made by animals to increase their star count; 1+ stars equals a win. Happy animals will provide food which can be quickly sold through an intuitive trading post menu. Selling produce quickly and efficiently is essential to obtaining a high score.

Made for an academic group game jam project - 5 weeks production 

Mechanics:

  • Time-management & time-based scoring
  • Feeding animals via first person shooter perspective
  • Easy to understand chunky 3d art
  • Tutorial /signposting /instructions 
  • Trading system
  • Scoring system
